Legends of the Hardwood
Breakfast

Saturday, April 1st, 2017

You're Invited

to get up close and personal with basketball legends, coaches and current players at the 21st annual Legends of the Hardwood Breakfast!

Get a look at basketball and prepare to be inspired, entertained, and challenged as sport leaders discuss character, integrity and faith in sports and life. This event is the only one if its kind during the Final Four weekend that is open to the public! Click here to reserve your seats now, as this event will sell-out!

Phoenix Convention Center
West Ballroom
Saturday April 1st, 2017
8:30 am

History Of Legends Breakfast

The Coach Wooden “Keys to Life” Award is presented annually to a member of the college or professional basketball community who lives out qualities exemplified by Coach Wooden; outstanding character, integrity, and leadership on the court, in the work place, in the home, and in the community. To learn more about Coach Wooden, visit his website.

Coach Wooden "Keys to Life" Award

The Coach Wooden "Keys to Life" Award is named in honor of legendary basketball coach John Wooden. During his years at UCLA, Coach wooden guided the Bruins to 10 National Championships (seven consecutive) as well as 19 conference titles.

This Award is presented annually to a member of the college or professional basketball community who lives out qualities exemplefied by Coach Wooden; oustanding character, integrity, and leadership on the court, in the work place, in the home, and in the community. To learn more about Coach Wooden, visit his website below.

Learn More
